explains: v. 使固定，粘上；可固定

sentences.en: Affix brightly colored shapes to the wall above baby's changing table.
sentences.cn: 在靠近宝宝更衣台的墙上粘贴颜色明亮、形状各异的图形。

sentences.en: Clerk: The letter is a little bit heavier. Please affix another stamp.
sentences.cn: 营业员：这信有点超重，请再贴一张邮票。

sentences.en: Moreover, static crosscutting lets you affix extensions and implementations to the fundamental structure of an object.
sentences.cn: 此外，静态横切可以把扩展和实现附加到对象的基本结构中。
